com.marklogic.mgmt.api

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.mgmt.api.API

  • public class API
extends com.marklogic.client.helper.LoggingObject
    Big facade-style class for the MarkLogic Management API. Use this to instantiate or access any resource, as it will handle dependencies for those resources.

      • buildDefaultObjectMapper

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host)
        Connect to a (presumably) different host, using the same username/password combos that were used for the same connection. Useful in a development environment where you may have multiple clusters with the same admin username/password combo, and you want to switch quickly from one to another.
        Parameters:
        host -

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Connect to a (presumably) different MarkLogic Management API. The username/password are assumed to work for both the Management API and the Admin API on port 8001.
        Parameters:
        host -
        username -
        password -
